body: @andorsk Can you please adjust the description of the issue to explain the problem you see and the solution you are proposing? It can then be discussed sync/async
#86 is also related with this 'need'. But the goal in there is to bypass the Cloud Agent + Prism Node to publish the `did:prism`

yeah, I feel we can close this issue and keep the discussion over the other one because it has a broader scope and was discussed recently over the weekly meetings.  The end goal is the same, put a DID on chain that was created by the edge SDK.
